text: jo tumhaare saamane vaazee aayaten padhata hai taaki jo log eemaan lae aur achchhe achchhe kaam karate rahe unako (kufr kee) taariqiyon se eemaan kee raushanee kee taraf nikaal lae aur jo khuda par eemaan lae aur achchhe achchhe kaam kare to khuda usako (behisht ke) un baagon mein daakhil karega jinake neeche naharen jaaree hain aur vah usamen abaadul aabaad tak rahenge khuda ne unako achchhee achchhee rozee dee hai
